item.title: slack like enterprise chat
item.description:
We are happy to introduce our collaboration app at https://yap.im. With powerful collaboration features, users are never out of loop in knowing whats happening and quickly responding to it

Weavely platform includes search, collaboration and identity as core constituents, each of these are pluggable to fit your enterprise needs.

Core Features

  • Messages & Files - Send messages, comments & files across public, private and 1:1 channels
  • Search - Search is snappy, with powerful regular expression support
  • Emojis & Social - Users can use emojis like :cool: while chatting or on messages
  • @-notifications - @-notify individuals or @all in the stream
